column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Seems like ramen is the hit food for the last few years. Â There have been at lest 6 pop up next to us in the area but will hands down say Jinya is the best. The flavor of the broth is always on point
column2: spicy and just salty enough. The meat is at good portion. The only down side I feel as though the restaurant tries to hard to trendy. At times the atmosphere is over bearing with millennials so my advise would be to get take out.
